name: MesSwitch
description:
this game was made as an entry for Icoso's GeoJam 2021 where the theme was SWITCH
you have to switch between different modes to be able to land on color coded platforms
keyboard and gamepad support!

Keys:
WASD for movement  
8456 for switching modes (also IJKL)
SPACE for Jump

Follow me on Twitter: Cryosimorgh
